title.narrative: Ceara Rural Sustainable Development and Competitiveness

description.narrative: Project Development objective: The objectives of the Project are to: (i) improve the sustainability of rural production and rural income generation; and (ii) contribute to the Borrower's efforts to universalize access to Water Services.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :IICA Agreement | Description :The IICA Agreement has been entered into by the Borrower and IICA, in a form andsubstance satisfactory to the Bank. | Due Date :26-Nov-2012
Finance Agreement :Loan registered with the Guarantor's Central Bank. | Description :The Loan has been duly registered with theGuarantor's Central Bank. | Due Date :21-Nov-2012
Finance Agreement :Operational Manual | Description :Should be ready by negotiations | Due Date :20-Dec-2012

Finance Agreement :Paragraph 5 (b)(Page 9) | Description :For the purposes of assisting in the carrying out of Parts 1 and 2(c) ofthe Project, and to formalize their respective responsibilities under the Project, enter into an agreement with EMATERCE, underterms and conditions satisfactory to the Bank (“EMATERCE Agreement”) | Due Date :30-Oct-2015

Finance Agreement :Project Managment Unit | Description :A unit within SDA, responsible for the management, coordination,supervision, monitoring and evaluation of the Project; should be operational not later than 30 days after the Effective Date | DueDate :16-Apr-2013

Finance Agreement :Project Territorial Units (13) | Description :Thirteen Territorial Units for decentralized projectimplementation, supervision and monitoring; should be operational not later than 30 days after the Effective Date | Due Date:15-Apr-2013
